24 
25  typedef KComplexElement< KSSimulation > KSSimulationBuilder;
26 
27  template< >
28  inline bool KSSimulationBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
29  {
30  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
31  {
32  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSSimulation::SetName );
33  return true;
34  }
35  if( aContainer->GetName() == "seed" )
36  {
37  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSSimulation::SetSeed );
38  return true;
39  }
40  if( aContainer->GetName() == "run" )
41  {
42  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSSimulation::SetRun );
43  return true;
44  }
45  if( aContainer->GetName() == "events" )
46  {
47  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSSimulation::SetEvents );
48  return true;
49  }
50  if( aContainer->GetName() == "step_report_iteration" )
51  {
52  if ( aContainer->AsReference<unsigned int>() == 0 )
53  {
54  mainmsg( eError ) << "Paramter of attribute <"
55  <<"step_report_iteration"
56  <<"> should not be 0"
57  <<eom;
58  }
59  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSSimulation::SetStepReportIteration );
60  return true;
61  }
62  if( aContainer->GetName() == "magnetic_field" )
63  {
64  KSComponent* tComponent = dynamic_cast<KSComponent*>
65  (getMagneticField(aContainer->AsReference<std::string>()));
66  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootMagneticField >
67  ( "root_magnetic_field" )->Command( "add_magnetic_field", tComponent );
68  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
69  return true;
70  }
71  if( aContainer->GetName() == "electric_field" )
72  {
73  KSComponent* tComponent = dynamic_cast<KSComponent*>
74  (getElectricField(aContainer->AsReference<std::string>()));
75  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootElectricField >
76  ( "root_electric_field" )->Command( "add_electric_field", tComponent );
77  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
78  return true;
79  }
80  if( aContainer->GetName() == "space" )
81  {
82  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
83  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
84  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSpace >
85  ( "root_space" )->Command( "add_space", tComponent );
86  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
87  return true;
88  }
89  if( aContainer->GetName() == "surface" )
90  {
91  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
92  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
93  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSpace >
94  ( "root_space" )->Command( "add_surface", tComponent );
95  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
96  return true;
97  }
98  if( aContainer->GetName() == "generator" )
99  {
100  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
101  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
102  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootGenerator >
103  ( "root_generator" )->Command( "set_generator", tComponent );
104  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
105  return true;
106  }
107  if( aContainer->GetName() == "trajectory" )
108  {
109  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
110  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
111  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootTrajectory >
112  ( "root_trajectory" )->Command( "set_trajectory", tComponent );
113  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
114  return true;
115  }
116  if( aContainer->GetName() == "space_interaction" )
117  {
118  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
119  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
120  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSpaceInteraction >
121  ( "root_space_interaction" )->Command( "add_space_interaction", tComponent );
122  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
123  return true;
124  }
125  if( aContainer->GetName() == "space_navigator" )
126  {
127  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
128  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
129  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSpaceNavigator >
130  ( "root_space_navigator" )->Command( "set_space_navigator", tComponent );
131  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
132  return true;
133  }
134  if( aContainer->GetName() == "surface_interaction" )
135  {
136  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
137  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
138  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSurfaceInteraction >
139  ( "root_surface_interaction" )->Command( "set_surface_interaction", tComponent );
140  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
141  return true;
142  }
143  if( aContainer->GetName() == "surface_navigator" )
144  {
145  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
146  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
147  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootSurfaceNavigator >
148  ( "root_surface_navigator" )->Command( "set_surface_navigator", tComponent );
149  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
150  return true;
151  }
152  if( aContainer->GetName() == "terminator" )
153  {
154  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
155  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
156  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootTerminator >
157  ( "root_terminator" )->Command( "add_terminator", tComponent );
158  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
159  return true;
160  }
161  if( aContainer->GetName() == "writer" )
162  {
163  KSComponent* tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >
164  ( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
165  KSCommand* tCommand = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootWriter >
166  ( "root_writer" )->Command( "add_writer", tComponent );
167  fObject->AddCommand( tCommand );
168  return true;
169  }
170  if( aContainer->GetName() == "command" )
171  {
172  fObject->AddCommand( KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSCommand >
173  ( aContainer->AsReference<std::string>() ));
174  return true;
175  }
176 
177  return false;
178  }
179 
180 }
